mil.emp3.api

Class Text

  • java.lang.Object
    • mil.emp3.api.abstracts.Container
      • mil.emp3.api.abstracts.Feature
        • mil.emp3.api.Text
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IContainer, IFeature, org.cmapi.primitives.IGeoAltitudeMode, org.cmapi.primitives.IGeoBase, org.cmapi.primitives.IGeoContainer, org.cmapi.primitives.IGeoPositionGroup, org.cmapi.primitives.IGeoRenderable, org.cmapi.primitives.IGeoText

    public class Text
extends mil.emp3.api.abstracts.Feature
implements org.cmapi.primitives.IGeoText
    This class positions text on the map at a specific coordinate.

        Returns:

        Parameters:
        value - the Text to set.

      • getRotationAngle

        public double getRotationAngle()
        This method retrieves the text rotation angle.
        Returns:
        The angle in degrees.

      • setRotationAngle

        public void setRotationAngle(double value)
        This method set the text rotation angle. The text will be rotated about the geographic coordinate point by the angle provided. A value of 0 degrees renders the text parallel to the latitudinal lines on the globe. A value of 90 degrees renders the text parallel to the longitudinal lines on the globe. the rotation is performed clockwise.
        Parameters:
        value - The rotation angle in degrees.

      • getFontFamily

        public java.lang.String getFontFamily()
        This method return the font family the text is rendered with.
        Returns:
        String

      • setFontFamily

        public void setFontFamily(java.lang.String fFamily)
        This method set the font family the text is to be rendered with. The map will use the closest font available.
        Parameters:
        fFamily - String

      • getFontSize

        public int getFontSize()
        This method retrieves the font size used to render the text.
        Returns:
        Integer
